scripts.build: linux: yarn run compile && pkg build/compile/index.js --target latest-linux-x64 --output build/output/bot-linux
scripts.build: macos: yarn run compile && pkg build/compile/index.js --target latest-macos-x64 --output build/output/bot-macos
scripts.build: window: yarn run compile && pkg build/compile/index.js --target latest-win-x64 --output build/output/bot-window.exe
